class  DL_WriterA
 Implements functions defined in DL_Writer for writing low level DXF constructs to an ASCII format DXF file. More...


Defines

#define DL_WRITER_ASCII_H
 If DL_WRITER_ASCII_H is defined, dl_writer_ascii.h has already been included and it will not be processed again.
If DL_WRITER_ASCII_H is undefined, it will be defined and dl_writer_ascii.h will be included.
